column4: if i have machines on different networks how can i consistantly ssh into all of them without using dyndns?
set each of them to a different port
why? they are separate machines on separate networks? why not have a different address for each... that is the way it works? I just don't understand what you're wanting or why
dyndns has to refresh i want to be able to send people boxes and be able to remotely administer them
